definitions.name: list

text.english:
Let \(A\) be a set. The set \(L_A\) of lists of elements of \( A \) is defined as follows:
  • Base Clause: \([] \in L_A\)
  • Inductive Clause: \(\forall a \in A .\; \forall l \in L_A .\; a :: [] \in L_A \).
The notation \( a::b::c::[] \) is equivalent to \([a, b, c]\).
text.italiano:
Sia \(A\) un insieme. L'insieme \(L_A\) delle liste di elementi di \( A \) è definito come segue:
  • Clausola Base: \([] \in L_A\)
  • Clausola Induttiva: \(\forall a \in A .\; l \in L_A .\; a :: [] \in L_A \).
La notazione \( a::b::c::[] \) è equivalente alla notazione \([a, b, c]\).

definitions.coq:
Notation Bool := bool.
Variable A : Type.
Variable eqA : A -> A -> Bool.
Infix "==" := eqA (at level 60). 
Notation "x || y" := (orb x y).
Inductive list : Type := | nil : list | cons : A -> list -> list.
Infix "::" := cons (at level 60, right associativity).
Notation "[ ]" := nil (format "[ ]").
Notation "[ x ]" := (cons x nil).
Notation "[ x ; y ; .. ; z ]" := (cons x (cons y .. (cons z nil) ..)).

definitions.name: app

text.english:
Let \( \texttt {app} : L_A \times L_A \to L_A \) be defined as follows:
  • Base Clause: \( \texttt{app}([], l_2) = l_2 \)
  • Inductive Clause: \( \texttt{app}(a :: l_1, l_2) = \texttt{app} a :: (l_1, l_2) \).
text.italiano:
Sia \( \texttt {app} : L_A \times L_A \to L_A \) definita come segue:
  • Clausola Base: \( \texttt{app}([], l_2) = l_2 \)
  • Clausola Induttiva: \( \texttt{app}(a :: l_1, l_2) = a :: \texttt{app} (l_1, l_2) \).

definitions.coq: Fixpoint app (x y : list) : list := match x with | [] => y | x::xs => x :: app xs y end.

definitions.name: belList

text.english:
Let \( \texttt {belList} : L_A \times A \to Bool \) be defined as follows:
  • Base Clause: \( \texttt{belList}([], b) = \texttt{false} \)
  • Inductive Clause: \( \texttt{belList}(a :: l, b) = \begin{cases} \texttt{true} & \text{if}\; a == b\\ \texttt{belList}(l, b) & \text{otherwise}\end{cases} \)
text.italiano:
Sia \( \texttt {belList} : L_A \times A \to Bool \) definita come segue:
  • Clausola Base: \( \texttt{belList}([], b) = \texttt{false} \)
  • Clausola Induttiva: \( \texttt{belList}(a :: l, b) = \begin{cases} \texttt{true} & \text{if}\; a == b\\ \texttt{belList}(l, b) & \text{otherwise}\end{cases}\)

definitions.coq: Fixpoint belList (l : list) (b : A) : Bool := match l with | [] => false | a::l' => if a == b then true else belList l' b end.

theorems.name: app_base_clause

text.english:
Base clause of definition of \(\texttt{app}\):

\[ \forall l_2 \in L_A .\; \texttt{app}([], l_2) = l_2 \]
text.italiano:
Clausola base della definizione di \(\texttt{app}\):


\[ \forall l_2 \in L_A .\; \texttt{app}([], l_2) = l_2 \]

theorems.coq:
Theorem app_base_clause : forall (l2 : list), app [] l2 = l2.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: app_inductive_clause

text.english:
Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{app}\):

\[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_A .\; \forall a \in A .\; \texttt{app}(a :: l_1, l_2) = \texttt{app} (l_1, l_2) \]
text.italiano:
Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{app}\):

\[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_A .\; \forall a \in A .\; \texttt{app}(a :: l_1, l_2) = \texttt{app} (l_1, l_2) \]

theorems.coq:
Theorem app_inductive_clause : forall (l1 : list) (l2 : list) (a : A) , app (a :: l1) l2 = a :: app l1 l2.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: belList_base_clause

text.english: Base clause of definition of \(\texttt{belList}\):\[ \forall b \in A .\; \texttt{belList}([], b) = \texttt{false} \]
text.italiano: Clausola base della definizione di \(\texttt{belList}\):\[ \forall b \in A .\; \texttt{belList}([], b) = \texttt{false} \]

theorems.coq:
Theorem belList_base_clause : forall (b : A), belList [] b = false.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: belList_inductive_clause

text.english: Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{belList}\): \begin{multline} \forall l \in L_A.\; \forall a,b \in A .\\ \texttt{belList}(a :: l, b) = \begin{cases} \texttt{true} & \text{if}\; a == b\\ \texttt{belList}(l, b) & \text{otherwise}\end{cases} \end{multline}
text.italiano: Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{belList}\): \begin{multline} \forall l \in L_A.\; \forall a,b \in A .\\ \texttt{belList}(a :: l, b) = \begin{cases} \texttt{true} & \text{if}\; a == b\\ \texttt{belList}(l, b) & \text{otherwise}\end{cases} \end{multline}

theorems.coq:
Theorem belList_inductive_clause : forall (l : list) , forall (a b : A) , belList (a :: l) b = if a == b then true else belList l b.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: or_absorbtion

text.english: \(\texttt{true}\) is the absorbing element of \(\vee\): \[ \forall b \in Bool.\; \texttt{true} \vee b = \texttt{true} \]
text.italiano: \(\texttt{true}\) è l'elemento assorbente di \(\vee\): \[ \forall b \in Bool.\; \texttt{true} \vee b = \texttt{true} \]

theorems.coq:
Theorem or_absorbtion : forall b : Bool , true || b = true.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.

theorems.name: or_identity

text.english: \(\texttt{false}\) is the identity element of \(\vee\): \[ \forall b \in Bool.\; \texttt{false} \vee b = b \]
text.italiano: \(\texttt{false}\) è l'elemento neutro di \(\vee\): \[ \forall b \in Bool.\; \texttt{false} \vee b = b \]

theorems.coq:
Theorem or_identity : forall b : Bool , false || b = b.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.

theorems.name: app_empty

text.english: \(\texttt{app}\) of a list and the empty list is equal to the original list: \[ \forall l_1 \in L_A.\; \texttt{app}(l_1,[]) = l_1 \]
text.italiano: \(\texttt{app}\) di una lista e la lista vuota equivale alla lista originale: \[ \forall l_1 \in L_A.\; \texttt{app}(l_1,[]) = l_1 \]

theorems.coq:
Theorem app_empty : forall l1 : list , app l1 [] = l1.
Proof.
Admitted.

theorems.name: app_assoc
theorems.coq:
Theorem app_assoc: forall l1 l2 l3 : list , app (app l1 l2) l3 = app l1 (app l2 l3).
Proof.
Admitted.

text.english: Proof by induction. Enter the induction variable:
text.italiano: Dimostrazione per induzione. Inserisci la variabile d'induzione:

text.english: Introduce a variable:\[ \texttt{"} P \to Q \texttt{"} \text{ becomes }\texttt{"}\text{given $P$ prove $Q$}\texttt{"} \]\[ \texttt{"}\forall (x : A) , P\texttt{"} \text{ becomes } \texttt{"}\text{given $(x : A)$ prove $P$}\texttt{"} \]
text.italiano: Introduce una variabile:\[ \texttt{"} P \to Q \texttt{"} \text{ diventa }\texttt{"}\text{dato $P$ dimostra $Q$}\texttt{"} \]\[ \texttt{"}\forall (x : A) , P\texttt{"} \text{ diventa } \texttt{"}\text{dato $(x : A)$ dimostra $P$}\texttt{"} \]

text.english: Proof by induction. Enter the induction variable:
text.italiano: Dimostrazione per casi. Inserire l'espressione su cui dividere i casi (nel secondo input si puo' mettere un nome per l'ipotesi):

text.english: Simplify an arithmetic expression, i.e. \[x+7+y+0+3=2+x+3+4+y+1\] becomes \[x+y+10=x+y+10\]
text.italiano: Semplifica una espressione aritmetica, i.e. \[x+7+y+0+3=2+x+3+4+y+1\] diventa \[x+y+10=x+y+10\]
